Posts.Content: You can come off anytime you like. The other thing I found really helpful is you have a research nurse allocated to you. Mine is a total legend and has really helped with me moving on from it all. They do phone consults after the first 6 months so you don’t have to go to the hospital all the time.
Posts.Title: Has anybody been asked to do a trial for the drug Abemaciclib (AKA...

Posts.Content: I’m on this trial and the drug is fine and it’s not like chemotherapy and I’m managing to work full-time. The follow up is very reassuring and I wouldn’t let the side -effects put you off. Clinical trials are not everyone’s cup of tea so nobody should feel guilty but don’t let the side effect profile put you off here -it’s been fine and lots have been signing up from my neck of the woods as it’s one of the more tolerated CDK inhibitors.
